articles.author: Brendan Caldwell
articles.title: Don't expect big reveals at Summer Games Fest, says Geoff Keighley - Rock Paper Shotgun
articles.description: Most games shown at Summer Games Fest 2024 will not be new, says Geoff Keighley. Don't expect Metal Gear Solid Delta, in other words.
articles.content: Since the death of E3, June has descended into a chaotic clusterfunk of trailers, broadcasts, announcements, and a generalised frenzy of publicity-seeking barking noises. Summer Game Fest has emerged… [+2190 chars]

articles.description: Sonos in May decided to get into the headphone market with the launch of the Sonos Ace headphones. The $449 Sonos Ace headphones have some...
articles.content: Sonos in May decided to get into the headphone market with the launch of the Sonos Ace headphones. The $449 Sonos Ace headphones have some enticing design elements and features you won't see in Apple… [+3562 chars]

articles.title: Baldur's Gate 3 Patch 7 adds official modding toolkit this autumn - Eurogamer
articles.description: Baldur's Gate 3 will finally add official mod support in September, after a summer of ongoing testing - which begins to…
articles.content:
Baldur's Gate 3 will finally add official mod support in September, after a summer of ongoing testing - which begins today.
Patch 7, which will include the game's modding toolkit, begins testing now… [+1937 chars]
